website_summaries.verdict: A versatile multi-purpose grater. The two sides can lock together to form one grater, or can be used separately.
pros: Lock the graters together for a stand-up grater perfect for use on the cutting board, or detach them to grate directly over your meal or into a pan
The secure non-slip rubber grip handle is comfortable to use
cons: Some users find the grater to be too dull for their hard cheese

customer_reviews.title: Good basic grater
customer_reviews.text: I've used the 4-sided graters for years as they are the most stable. But eventually they dull, and it always seems the support bottom wire that runs around the bottom edge, rusts. Since that's where the grated food falls, not ideal. Even those 'rubber bumper' ones don't protect from the rust; they loosen up and wear out over time. Decided to try this based on good reviews. It's stable when open, although I don't much like how easily the two halves separate when folded as it makes it hard to put away without rubber-banding it. Oxo should put a little clip somewhere to keep it together for storage. Nice and sharp grater holes; when opened up it's stable.
customer_reviews.author: JKomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two years, , but.....SNAPPED
customer_reviews.text: Lasted TWO years, But.... nice and sharp and shredded well, but since I freeze some of my cheese, especially parmesan, it's a little hard still when i grate it. Today the plastic top snapped so it will be difficult to hold and use it any longer. I think a grater should last much longer than two years, especially if it rates so many stars.......
customer_reviews.author: Proaction

customer_reviews.title: This grater is really great. I works so well and with little effort ...
customer_reviews.text: This grater is really great. I works so well and with little effort and because of the design it is much easier to clean than the box type ones. This is very good quality, just as have all my OXO products have been. We own many OXO brand products and we love to cook and they make good quality products at good price. You can buy cheaper products and I have, but they don't stand up to hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on both sides
customer_reviews.text: I found it a bit awkward to use. Stand up on a plate and cheese goes everywhere. In a bowl and hand hits bowl, cheese still goes everywhere. Separate the pieces and lay flat on a bowl and it moves all over the place (again, cheese everywhere). I could still live with it but then the plastic on one side cracked. A little while later the plastic on the other side cracked. I usually love products by this brand but this one didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the foldable design! Regular use to shred block cheese! I am very hard to pleased given I take it very serious on how effective and efficient my kitchen tools are. This grater is sharp, quality, comfortable to hold and compact when folded. The best cheese grater I have had. Generally speaking, I do trust OXO products as they have rarely fail my expectation. You can buy this without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Great design and poor materials. This grater lasted 8 months before the plastic cracked away from the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary of this product due to some of the reviews and images of it broken, but I have been using this grater almost daily since I received it and it works great! The handle is comfortable to grip, the grater is large enough to easily grate a Costco block if cheese, it is dishwasher safe, and can be pulled apart for storage or to use individually. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSteph

customer_reviews.title: Large grater too small
customer_reviews.text: Grater was very nice except the large grater side is a little too small for my needs. While grating apples for muesli, it grated them too mushy rather than into nice grated pieces. I tried it with several different apples so I know it wasn’t the apple. I tried the same apples on my old box grater and they did fine. Guess I’ll just keep IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davila

customer_reviews.title: Best grater and best value
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of these that I bought at Ross and used exclusively for 5 years until it broke. I love it and this one I just bought here on Amazon looks so much sturdier & more ergonomic than my old one. It still remains my favorite grater and I own about 6 different kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Water&#39;s Wdge

customer_reviews.title: Best grater I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: At the age of 67, I've finally found my ideal grater. This product is sturdy and the grating surface is sharp. It comes apart for easy clean up (how many times have I tried to get up into a grater to get those pesky MIA cheese bits only to fail?). It comes apart easily to use the different surfaces separately or for cleaning. I'm thinking I'll buy one for each of my children's families. That's how good it is!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G. Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a box grater
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of OXO products, but this design disappoints. It does not provide a stable base for grating cheese which allows it to move a lot while in use. And without sides the cheese drops over a wide area. I find myself going back to the old box type grater.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because I like things to be more compact - that way I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of all things OXO. I purchased this because I like things to be more compact - that way I can put it easily in a drawer. I found that the way you have to separate the two pieces to take complete advantage of its compactness is very difficult. You must push and slide very forcefully to separate the two components (and almost equally the same to put it back together). There are other benefits to separating it, such as easier cleaning and fresh slicing over the target food.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Flores

customer_reviews.title: As it turns out, this was the IMperfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my wife, who is a culinary instructor as well as being an avid baker & cook. It was to be a replacement for her old one on which the handle had broken. Thought this design would have been very handy for her since it can be broken down-she also caters several large events annually. Not the case. Suffice it to say, I had to find another one. The handle on this one is very large & as it turns out caused her a lot of pain while trying to hold the grater. Had to return this one & get a regular grater made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Molly_Dog

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought the OXO Good Grips Grater as our last grater kicked the bucket after years of use. As we've always had great luck with the OXO products, this seemed like a good purchase. It worked well for all of our grating needs, though mostly used for cheese. Sadly, it broke after less that 6 months of use. The plastic on the bottom just snapped off where it met the metal. If I was sure this was an unlikely occurrence, I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again. But from a quick glance in the reviews, I'm not alone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S.

customer_reviews.title: Best grater ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a cheese lover, so a lot of cheese gets grated at my house. Let me tell you, this is one of the best graters I have ever used. I LOVE that it comes apart as two separate graters, it makes loading it into the dishwasher a breeze. The two bottom sides of the grater have little grips on the bottom so that it wont slide around while you are grating! This thing is great, another great product by OXO.
customer_reviews.author: haley.kTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. First grater I've ever loved. It stays put well with great grips. It comes apart easily for cleaning and folds together easily for storage. The cheese grates easily as well. Can't beat this one. Updating my review and after many months I ADORE this cheese grater. The cheese grates so easily and smooth. I normally ask my husband to grate the cheese because my arthritis prevents me but not with this puppy. LOVE IT !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jansema

customer_reviews.title: Clever Design - works great
customer_reviews.text: Clever design. Perfect for using upright or separated. The separation also allows for more compact storage. It is slanted just right making it comfortable to use. The grip and footing are non slip to help keep the grater in place. The plastic is of good quality and is molded in such a way to keep the metal from becoming loose or bent. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F.

customer_reviews.title: The single best cheese grater since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used the rectangular box style cheese grater for years, until we've decided enough is enough. I purchased this grater as a gag gift for her and we both absolutely love it. It's easier to hold, easier to clean, easier to manage for grating. This is hands down the best cheese grater we've used. The only downside is for super fine grating of hard cheeses I'd recommend a rotary grater.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Rogacewicz

customer_reviews.title: Best grater ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it for the RV because it collapses and takes less space, but going to get one for home, since it is so much easier to clean and use that the one we have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not separate easily for individual use as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Grates well, but it does not disassemble easily. The two sides are supposed to come apart for individual use and easy cleaning. Mine does not come apart easily. It is very stiff and when trying to disassemble, I'm afraid I'm going to grate my hands as I need to put a lot of force to separate the sides. Ended up only using the grater standing up as it's too complicated to take apart.
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: I like this grater, my favorite feature is it's two pieces you can take apart and stack to store so it takes up less space. We have limited cabinet space and only 4 drawers in our kitchen, it's a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell P.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: Best grater ever! Wow! Blades are sharp and sturdy, handles are big and easy to grip, and it detaches for easy drawer storage. I will NEVER buy a stand up grater again. I've been using it for about 3 months with no sign of use. Oh, and it's super easy to clean. It can be used as a standing grater when assembled but I tend to use each side seperately. It's really convenient to grate directly over the food. It's super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great grater!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grater! Pun intended! Love the ability to fold it flat for storage or take it apart for different usage applications. Washes great, and is very well made. Happy with my purchase. OXO is a great, trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christie L. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean & store
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy grater that comes apart easily for cleaning. I use it on a cutting board primarily to grate cheese. I like that it opens up wide, providing plenty of space for whatever you are grating to land in a nice pile.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: A great little cheese grater.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a replacement to a friend who broke hers. Now her mom wants one and neither one can stop singing it's praises. It's very study and the handle on top affords a very good grip. It has rubber or some kind of soft coating on the bottom to keep it from sliding across the counter as you grate.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my flat pampered chef grater broke. I liked the fact that this can be used either together standing up like a box grater or taken apart and used separately. Seems sharp and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Btripp

customer_reviews.title: Cutting face is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Just gave it its first job, some hard cheese. The cutting surface has about 1/8th inch give. Cheap steel. I was hurried and it made the job harder. Enough so that I'm going to get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: when you need something grated quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this greater not because I needed the function but because other of my kitchen equient such as the stand mixers shearer attachment takes to much time to set up when I only need all amount of cheese grated Besides, cleaning up the hand shrewder is much easier than cleaning power tool attacents. This said I use the OXO grater on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: Luke F

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and large size. Have not see this model in any stores. Easily separates the two halves
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grater
customer_reviews.text: I love this grater! Doesn't slip around during use. Folds for storing, taking up much less space than a box grater. That you can detach the pieces to use one side is wonderful; makes it easy to grate directly over a bowl or pan. Wouldn't want another after using this! Another great product from Oxo!
customer_reviews.author: bluechiguy

customer_reviews.title: Great but it broke
customer_reviews.text: Loved this grater because it stores small but still works great for large or small shreds of cheese and whatnot. However, after 3 years the plastic snapped today while I was grating potatoes. Bummer that I’m going to have to buy another grater so soon, it’s not like I used this that frequently that it should break already.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. it awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for one easier to clean than my old box style, More self supportive than my old flat one. This one hits the spot. Feels very durable, this is going to last for many years
customer_reviews.author: BryanB

customer_reviews.title: Good little shredder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shredder - I love that it collapses when not in use to save on space. I've only used the larger blade side with a medium-soft cheese and the blades are sharp and it works very well. It seems to be of good construction - it doesn't feel flimsy when you're applying pressure to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good household product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I have had no problem in grading soft cheese using the coarse side. It does take a little effort to separate the two pieces but not much. Just make sure the unit is closed first. I like that it folds and takes up little room in the kitchen drawer. The handle is just right for me and I am a male with average size hands.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good hole sizes and grips well. They are a bit big for your kitchen drawer though.
customer_reviews.author: PapaSully

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I thought it would be but it is great. It is easy to hold, quite sharp and very easy to clean. I like that it can come apart so you can rest one piece on a bowl and grate straight into the bowl. Works really well. We use it for carrots, potatoes, zucchini, and ginger.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Well built and useful little tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my proudest purchases as a semi adult. It works as promised, is sleek and easy to clean. As I have limited storage space in my kitchen, it's great that I can split it up and store it vertically next to my cutting boards and baking pans. I also enjoy the overall build quality of the grater, with my fingers so close to the metal surface at the back end of grating a piece of cheese or vegetables, its great to know that the grip is solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It takes two
customer_reviews.text: This grater works great. The fact that it comes apart is the best feature it has. I find it's better to work with each half separately.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: more flexible than a 4 sided grater.
customer_reviews.text: these are so flexible - you can use them linked together and standing up, or separate them and use one directly over a bowl. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: RCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Grater!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how much I truly love this gift. My hubby got it for me for Valentines Day and it is by far one of his best purchases yet. I love how easy it is to use and how I can maneuver the grater to do whatever I need it to
customer_reviews.author: Lenni Snow

customer_reviews.title: Cheese and more Cheese.
customer_reviews.text: This Cheese greater works better then expected. i thought it was going to do just a ok job when grating the cheese. but it really dose grate it faster then a regular grater and it also was super easy to clean. easier then the regular graters as well. All in all we are very VERY happy with the product and would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a grater.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this. She said it is made just right for for all kinds of grating.
customer_reviews.author: William Straff

customer_reviews.title: Nice grater and great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice grater and great design. It folds to a compact size or you can take it apart and store in 2 pieces. I really like that it is stainless steel-no worry about rust.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce523

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We love how it grates and is very easy to clean. Really cool that you can take it apart and lay the grates flat for more ease of use if you need to. We would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, While it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The plastic isn't up to the task of being a long-term kitchen tool. Purchased in Dec 2016. Broke in Oct 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: All fixed position graters are hard to clean but this one is very easy.
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this for sometime. All fixed position graters are hard to clean but this one is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Grater 2.0!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, compared to my old knuckle-buster this is a dream. It has a rubber bottom and stays put, doesn't slide all over the place. Easy to clean and fold for easy storage. I recommend this as a inexpensive upgrade that makes a differnce.
customer_reviews.author: RonS

customer_reviews.title: Storing is a breeze with this grater
customer_reviews.text: What sets this grater a part from the pack is that I can take it apart so that it fits nicely in my kitchen drawer. Sure, it grates well, but so does any other box grater. I enjoy the fact that this stores easily and is easy to use. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy D.

customer_reviews.title: It was nice and flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter while staying at her house. She's a minimalist and this works perfectly. It was nice and flat. When it opens it's very stable. I like it better than folding one I own and I will purchase one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: A good option for those who don't have enough space for ...
customer_reviews.text: A good option for those who don't have enough space for a full box grater in their kitchen. This folds up really nicely and each of the ends have rubber stopper like surfaces so that it's easy to use when on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Two (ungrated) thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and super design; sits upright on its own, so it takes the trouble out of holding the grater at the perfect angle and, most importantly, reduces the risk of slipping. It's kind of wonderful and a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda!

customer_reviews.title: over-engineered and impractical
customer_reviews.text: Spills cheese everywhere, doesn't really fit on most bowls. More cheese than usual seems to stick to this grater. The fact that it comes apart is actually more of a nuisance than anything. I would recommend just buying a normal box grater.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, heavy duty Grater!! I love that it comes apart as well.
customer_reviews.author: JVGIRL

customer_reviews.title: I've never used it, but my spouse has and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never used it, but my spouse has and he insisted on it because it works wells an collapses for ease of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Good quality and it stands up so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Good quality and it stands up so you can use it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cajungirl

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool - want to give one to everyone I know
customer_reviews.text: Best part of this grater is that it come apart for storage and that only the side that gets used has to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: We just love this grater, much better than my box grater. Does not move around because of the non slip base..
customer_reviews.author: JeromeP43

customer_reviews.title: Not Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, until it breaks. Which is a pity, because I liked it, e.g. for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sambura

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this grater
customer_reviews.text: Longer stroke and sharper teeth and better angle than the old box grater style things I've been using for a lifetime. Also love that it folds up to a point that it fits into a drawer in the kitchen. Mostly use it for cheese grating.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this grater
customer_reviews.text: Love this grater. You can even shred motz easily. As a matter of fact the first two time I used it I grated way too much because its pretty effortless. Cleans easily and love the compact size when folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. It is nice to be able to separate the grater to clean. I also like having a whole side of the grater for course, and the other for fine grating.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in lieu of Pampered Chef version. Works great and costs less. I like that you can fold it almost flat.
customer_reviews.author: lovemydog

customer_reviews.title: OXO drives high expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to save since and my impression was it would lay flat. It doesn't. It's still a great gater, very sturdy and pretty compact, but I expect OXO to be perfect always, so I'm a tad disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: th3byrdm4n

customer_reviews.title: Anything OXO is well thought out, quality and practical . Oh I forgot affordable- Check out their Salt and pepper grinders
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart to use separately, folds together in compact fashion, Anything OXO is well thought out, quality and practical . Oh I forgot affordable FYI I do not have shares in the company but I would certainly invest in it-good reliable anything they make
customer_reviews.author: Hal 9000

customer_reviews.title: I wish the metal part is thicker, more heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the metal part is thicker, more heavy duty. Right now the metal part is thin and flimsy. Flexes a lot as I am pushing the cheese down.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Much more sturdy than previous fold our graters I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Much more sturdy than previous fold our graters I have owned, and my housemates who insist on fold out graters only find it quite satisfactory. the grater metal wraps all around the plastic for the metal component, reinforcing the parts that most often have broken in our previous graters, so after 3 months of use, it still shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chalemdrel

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: This grater makes a world of difference! I was probably cooking with one of the original iterations of cheese graters and will soon be contacted by a museum so that they can display it in a case about harder times, but this grater is a huge improvement. I even managed to slice quite a bit of my finger off at one point -- so be sure to remain attentive.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grater with simple surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, and I am picky about my box(ish) graters. Just 2 sides, but honestly, I use a rasp for hard cheese, ginger and zests, so sacrificing the 2 never used sides so that I can have a folding grater is totally worth it. This one is sturdily made. It is my third folding grater and I can tell already that it will last significantly better than the previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: THE ULTIMATE!
customer_reviews.text: These are superb! I like the way I can close the sides & store them in a drawer that's already over-stuffed. I gave away my big ones because I'll never use any other grater....This one's perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: frustrating, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: this is a frustrating grater. it bends with the pressure as you grate, which makes the motion unsteady. the grating holes are just not sharp enough. i was trying to get two graters for the price of one better quality grater. lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: jaenai

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of OXO items and this one is not very good. Easy to store but does not work as well as a normal box grater.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! I got an "electric" one for a wedding gift and it never worked right, so I decided to buy this one and I love the handle, and the openness! Now more fishing for the cheese stuck inside! Cleans up easily, too!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic breaks
customer_reviews.text: Worked good before it broke, I'm so tired of everything being made from cheap plastic. The larger half's handle broke off after about 10 months of use, and the other side's handle just broke off after another 10 or so months of use. The one I had prior to this, an all metal box style lasted 20+ years! Going back to that style.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I use it for blocks of Cheddar
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I like that it pulls apart which makes it for easier cleaning. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: CkWorld

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it comes apart, good quality (like I've come to expect from OXO brand)
customer_reviews.author: snowqueen84

customer_reviews.title: I’m super disappointed, because it was so awesome and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is broken already, after only 2 months of normal use. I’m super disappointed, because it was so awesome and I loved it till it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ehmke

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Loving this grater - it stores in a drawer, and comes apart easily (but only when you want it to) for cleaning or using each side separate.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great until it falls apart!
customer_reviews.text: In less than one year, the plastic holding the metal grater broke away so that it no longer functions and is unsafe to try to use. Very disappointing, as the functionality is great otherwise. Will go back to Zylis for next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lwh

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful hand grater. Please be careful as you can easily grate the edge of a finger on it! I use it for horseradish. The cutters are in both the up and down positions making it fast and giving it that little danger edge! I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Star Goddess

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: This cheese grater is really easy to clean, and grating cheese is much more expediant than old style graters. The cheese grating is a cleaner experience as well. This is a very sturdy piece of equipment, and storage is nice because it isn't very bulky. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Earl Malveaux

customer_reviews.title: ... hands and find most of the OXO products are pretty ergonomic and fit me
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands and find most of the OXO products are pretty ergonomic and fit me. Works well. Useful for its purpose and easy to store. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, clever design
customer_reviews.text: I love that this item folds closed, but also easily slides apart. Great for hard cheeses and all sorts of other applications it can be used as a stand up grater or as a plane by taking it apart. It also folds closed for storage.
customer_reviews.author: HeartsofHavoc

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good Grips Multi Grater
customer_reviews.text: the plastic holding the metal grater broke away so that it no longer functions. plastic frame is fragile and cracked. Find a different type plastic. Find a stronger type plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Don Currence

customer_reviews.title: Grater with comfortable handle
customer_reviews.text: Handy cheese grater, one way, but two sizes. So far the handle holds it up for grating on a plate, but no attachment for on a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. crumpy

customer_reviews.title: I won't go with any other grater but this one now!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a decent grater and I will buy this one over & over again if anything ever happens to mine. Great to fold for storage without taking up alot of room. Can grate both ways and conveniently stands over a bowl and has non skid/slidding legs. Have had for several months with no problems and it's easy & comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Best grater ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most comfortable cheese grater I have ever had. It is a little large but I put it in a drawer out of the way. It grates cheese so fast and cleans up like a dream. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 year of infrequent use. The joint ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1 year of infrequent use. The joint of the metal to plastic is not strong - which is odd as it is an item meant to be pushed on!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel MG

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE, LIGHT AND MANAGEABLE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Stays put when standing but is not bulky like other graters. Works really well and is easy to clean (unlike box graters). I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Babia

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grater because I have a very tiny kitchen and not much drawer or cupboard space. It fit like a glove in my tiny space yet gave me the use of a full size grater. It's only has 2 sides however, they are they sides you use the most.
customer_reviews.author: zfrogg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. i use only this grater now for my potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aviva Leah Hirshman

customer_reviews.title: Best grip ever!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 years, use it a lot and it still works good. The metal part is kind of bending in a bit but its still does the job well and safely. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maia

customer_reviews.title: Works great and folds up for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. Works great and folds up for easy storage. Also easy to clean. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: This grater stands nicely stable while grating things and I like that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This grater stands nicely stable while grating things and I like that I can take it apart for easy cleaning or to just use one side. Pretty compact for storage and I've had no issues putting it through the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. SO much better than my normal cheese grater. And super easy to wash!
customer_reviews.author: Elise315

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Great for saving space in the kitchen versus traditional square-base graters. I love how I can take it apart and put the grater directly over the bowl or plate to catch all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: Great design! I gave it as a wedding shower gift and it was definitely appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: cemillard

customer_reviews.title: Oxo. Good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice grater with two options. Sits well in the dishwasher and folds a bit for easy storage. I'd buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Great design and comes apart for easy cleaning. I know my wife won't ever get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Gramse

customer_reviews.title: We use the grater a lot, and is holding ...
customer_reviews.text: We use the grater a lot, and is holding up well. Cleans up well, with no signs of rusting, and stays sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Its great because it can be used in so many ways, not just in the standing position.
customer_reviews.author: Semper

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Multi Grater
product_meta.description: The OXO Good Grips Two-Fold Grater offers convenient grating versatility in one tool, tackling both medium and coarse grating tasks, over a cutting board or directly into a bowl. Its unique bi-fold design allows it to stand upright on a cutting board or the two grating surfaces can be separated for individual use right over a bowl. The medium grating surface is ideal for vegetables, hard cheeses, carrots, zucchini, chocolate and more. The coarse grating surface is ideal for semi-soft cheeses, butter, apples, cabbages, potatoes, onions and more. Soft, comfortable, non-slip handles ensure a secure grip in your hand during repetitive grating motions and the non-slip feet keep the Grater in place on any surface. The Grater disassembles for easy cleaning and folds flat for convenient storage.
feature_bullets: Sharp stainless steel blades for fast, easy grating
Coarse grating surface for semi-soft cheeses, butter, apples, cabbages, potatoes, onions and more
Medium grating surface for vegetables, hard cheeses, carrots, zucchini, chocolate and more
Grating surfaces lock together or come apart for individual use and easy cleaning
